item.title: Customers who purchase the GeForce RTX 3080 and 3090 are eligible to receive a Call of Duty game bundle
item.description:
Image: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War promotional image highlighting the Woods Operator Pack and Confrontation Weapons Pack. NVIDIA is running a limited-time promotion offering a free copy of Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War with the purchase of qualifying GeForce RTX 3080 or 3090 graphics cards and pre-built PCs. Releasing on November 13, 2020, Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is the newest installment in the popular Call of Duty series...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/customers-who-purchase-the-geforce-rtx-3080-and-3090-are-eligible-to-receive-a-call-of-duty-game-bundle/

item.title: Singtel and Riot Games Southeast Asia introduce the world's first gaming bundles for League of Legends: Wild Rift that are zero-rated
item.description:
Singtel has teamed up with Riot Games Southeast Asia to launch the first-ever zero-rated gaming bundles for League of Legends: Wild Rift. Zero-rating means data used for a specific activity won’t count towards a user’s data limit and won’t incur extra charges. League of Legends: Wild Rift, a five-versus-five mobile multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA), brings the popular PC game League of Legends to mobile devices. These new RiotGO and RiotGO+ bundles, available exclusively for Singtel postpaid mobile customers, offer unlimited data-free gameplay and up to S$40 worth of in-game content for Wild Rift...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singtel-and-riot-games-southeast-asia-introduce-the-world-s-first-gaming-bundles-for-league-of-legends-wild-rift-that-are-zero-rated/

item.title: AMD has launched a new bundle featuring the Radeon RX 590
item.description:
Source: AMD website. The AMD Raise the Game bundle comes with free PC versions of three games. AMD is dedicated to making exceptional gaming experiences accessible to everyone. That’s why they’re promoting their Radeon RX 590 as a budget-friendly yet powerful 1080p graphics card that can deliver impressive visuals at over 60 frames per second (FPS). Utilizing the redesigned Polaris architecture, the 8 GB Radeon RX 590 offers the memory capacity needed to provide lifelike visuals and high performance for HD gaming...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/amd-has-launched-a-new-bundle-featuring-the-radeon-rx-590/
